scripts.prepare:local: mustache config/local.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/local.json const.template.ts > src/const.ts
scripts.prepare:arb-rinkeby: mustache config/arb-rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/arb-rinkeby.json const.template.ts > src/const.ts
scripts.build-contract: solc contracts/Gravity.sol --abi -o abis --overwrite && solc contracts/Gravity.sol --bin -o bin --overwrite
